Class SecureStringOnlineEftposCredentialProvider

Holds the credentials required to obtain tokens from the Online Eftpos API as System.Security.SecureString instances.

Inheritance

SecureStringOnlineEftposCredentialProvider

Namespace: Yort.OnlineEftpos
Assembly: Yort.OnlineEftpos.dll
Syntax
public sealed class SecureStringOnlineEftposCredentialProvider : IOnlineEftposCredentialProvider, IDisposable
Remarks

This credential provider should be marginally more secure than the OnlineEftposCredentialsProvider on platforms where it is supported.

Use of this class does not guarantee any level of security, but it should help to reduce the likelihood of specific risks such as unencrypted credentials being saved in swap files or being available in buffer overrun situations.

This class is not available on all platforms. On some platforms System.Security.SecureString is not available. On other platforms System.Security.SecureString is available but does not provide the same level of security as on standard .Net and is deliberately not supported so as not to induce false expectations.

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Security.SecureString consumerKey

The consumer key value issued to the application when it was registered with the Online Eftpos API, as System.Security.SecureString reference.
System.Security.SecureString consumerSecret

The consumer secret value issued to the application when it was registered with the Online Eftpos API, as System.Security.SecureString reference.
